description: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL on design of four Commercial facilities projects
full_summary:
PRE-GAP stream WEB & CRM applications Tester

## Call for Tender
Environment and Climate Change Canada invites you to submit a tender for a Tester to work on the development and testing of web and CRM applications. This tender corresponds to the PRE-GAP project, which aims to improve the delivery of web and CRM applications.

## Tender Information

### Title
Stream 1 – Applications Services – Level 3 A.11 Tester

### Reference Number
cb-1-67066085

### Status
Expired (Tender Closing Date: November 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET)

### Expected Contract Period
January 1, 2024 - December 31, 2024

### Overview
The chosen candidate will work with existing Project Managers and IT Project Teams to create and document test plans, coordinate testing procedures, and perform functional, performance, and accessibility testing for web and CRM applications.

### Key Requirements
- Develop and document test plans and plans for walkthroughs and reviews
- Manage and monitor test plans for all levels of testing
- Conduct functional, performance, and accessibility testing for web and CRM applications
- Capture and report test status and results using Azure Devops
- Develop test scenarios, scripts, and reports
- Establish and operate interoperability testing procedures to ensure software compatibility and performance

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria
Interested vendors meeting the eligibility criteria will undergo an evaluation based on their technical merit and price offerings.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact Anthony De Flavis via email at anthony.deflavis@ec.gc.ca or through phone at (438) 801-0777.
